sentences.sentence: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 28 Palestinians in Gaza's southern city, Rafa, early on Saturday.

sentences.sentence: Hungary's President Novak has resigned amid outrage over her pardoning of a man convicted in a child sexual abuse case.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A Russian drone strike on Kharkiv, Ukraine's second largest city, killed at least seven people overnight, including three children, the region's governor reported on Saturday.

sentences.sentence: He said the Iranian-made Shaheed drones hit civilian infrastructure in the city, causing a massive fire that burned down 15 houses. but we are holding on. The DPRS workers are working. Our communal service is working. We will give housing to everyone who needs to move. The drones primarily targeted the northeastern Kharkiv region and the southern province of Odessa, it said in a statement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to Odessa's regional governor, four people were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 28 Palestinians in Rafah early on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The attack occurred only hours after Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced plans to evacuate hundreds of thousands of people from the southern Gaza city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: During the night, three airstrikes hit homes in Rafah and killed multiple members of three families.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: During the night on Saturday, the IDF Air Force struck targets in the outskirts of Syria's capital, Damascus. Syria's official news agency, Sana, says the airstrikes were launched from the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights.

sentences.sentence: Britain-based War Monitor, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, said one of the strikes hit a residential building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hungary's President Katalin Novak announced her resignation on Saturday after coming under

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: mounting pressure for pardoning a man convicted for covering up a sex abuse case in a children's home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I made a mistake.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Today is the last day that I address you as a president, Novak said in a speech broadcast on state television.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On April 27 last year, ahead of Pope Francis' visit to Hungary, Novak pardoned the former deputy director of a children's home. The man was sentenced to more than three years in prison for helping to cover up the sexual abuse committed by the institution's director, who himself was sentenced to eight years for his abuse of at least 10 children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On the same day, the Hungarian president pardoned 22 other cases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Viktor Orb√°n announced on Thursday that he had proposed to amend Hungary's constitution that would prevent those convicted of crimes against children from receiving presidential pardons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over a thousand people protested in Budapest on Friday, demanding Novak's resignation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The volcano eruption in southwestern Iceland is over, according to Iceland's meteorological

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The volcano erupted Thursday, ejecting lava 80 meters high from a three-kilometer-long crack in the earth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's the third time a volcano has erupted in the area since December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The eruption disrupted the heat and hot water supplies for thousands of residents in the town of Grindavik.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Scientists are warning that the area may experience further eruptions in the coming months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Climate activist Greta Thunberg joins banned French anti-motorway protests

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: where police fired tear gas and made arrests a day earlier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The 53-kilometer A69 motorway project, which aims to open up a rural area, is strongly contested by environmental activists, who have mobilized several times in recent months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The government is determined to complete the A69 project, which will cut travel time between Toulouse and Castres by 20 minutes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The motorway is expected to open in 2025.
